name: ActiveCampaign Trigger
natural_language_description: 这是 ActiveCampaign Trigger 节点。主要用于: Handle ActiveCampaign events via webhooks

events.name: events
events.description: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression
events.natural_language_description: 参数名: Event Names or IDs | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression | 默认值: []

sources.name: sources
sources.natural_language_description: 参数名: Source | 默认值: []
available_options: Public (值: public) - Run the hooks when a contact triggers the action
Admin (值: admin) - Run the hooks when an admin user triggers the action
Api (值: api) - Run the hooks when an API call triggers the action
System (值: system) - Run the hooks when automated systems triggers the action
